events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin reviewing your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles, specifically for the software developer track based on your resume.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering hires has been assigned to your case to guide you through the next steps of the recruitment process.
During the initial screening call, we discussed your software development experience and assessed your fit for the engineer position.
You responded positively to our initial feedback and expressed excitement about moving forward with the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 10th at 10 AM UTC with one of our senior software engineers.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
The HR interview has been scheduled for April 15th at 2 PM UTC to discuss culture fit and company values.
The HR interview was completed successfully, and our team was impressed by your interpersonal skills and alignment with our company culture.
An offer has been proposed including competitive salary and benefits for the Software Engineer position.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and raised a few questions about remote work policies which we addressed promptly.
You formally accepted the offer, and we are excited to have you join our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started with the delivery of necessary equipment and access to internal systems.
The hiring process is now closed as you have successfully joined and started your new role within the engineering department.
